title: HUGE constant lag bug (perfect ping with overwatch but not league)
body: when i play league i get constant 473 ms but its perfect with youtube and overwatch i can literally play vids on hd 720 whats wrong with this game

replies.body: Your connection specifically to the game server might be unstable and causing packet loss.  Are you on wi-fi?  See if a [power cycle](https://kb.netgear.com/19755/How-to-Power-Cycle-Your-Home-Network?cid=wmt_netgear_organic) and [port forward](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) might help here.
